snippet: Armed groups executed more than 250 civilians, including 83 children, in one area of the Democratic Republic of Congo this year, according to a United Nations report.
abstract: United Nations report finds that armed groups executed more than 250 civilians, including 83 children, in North Kivu Province area of Democratic Republic of Congo in 2012; report refers to killings as 'systematic human rights violations.'
lead_paragraph: Armed groups executed more than 250 civilians, including 83 children, in one area of the Democratic Republic of Congo this year, according to a United Nations report.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
